A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had an emotional reaction to several of the scenes\, and I initially walked away liking a lot of the film.. but overall I feel they did a poor job of building on the momentum from TFA. This is a terrible closure to Luke's overall arc. Doesn't feel like he would ever behave as he did in this movie. Also ALL the jokes are terrible. Cringe-worthy. Boooring side plots that add nothing interesting overall and take you away from things you care about. They also totally wasted Snoke\, could have been a great villain instead he was shallow as pointless as any other CGI monster in a big budget flick. It's depressing to hear that this guy is gonna direct 4 more Star Wars movies now... they need to bring JJ back.
